title: Server Lag Again?!
body:
Hello and welcome back to venting your frustration. 
For some reason once again after rito claimed to have fixed these issues we are getting a wee bit of lag in games! Anyone else out there? {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I just wanna play league of legends, should be renamed to league of lag! So upsetting that after I finish school today I won't be able to play league. The lag always seems to happen after they release an update? could just be me but I see a pattern happening...
Same with me, every single player was disconnecting every 30 seconds, no loss prevented, such a bloody joke
Lagged all game, no loss prevented, legit was unplayable
